entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmp55_0o9ng/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0081.9278] The line item concept us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableRelatedParties with a value of -28,284 and a calculation parent of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities is represented as a sibling of us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties with a value of 0 in the extension taxonomy role 105 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows, but us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableRelatedParties is represented as a descendent of us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromRelatedParties in the calculation relationships defined in the US GAAP taxonomies. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for these two line item concepts.
The properties of this us-gaap:IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableRelatedParties fact are:
Period :2018-01-01 to 2018-06-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9278 Rule version: 9.0.0RC4 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1375686/000106299318003444/thti-20180630.xml 874
